overview:
Researcher and developer, tinkerer, creator and artist in emerging web technologies, trends and social media.

An Arabian, American, Indian, Pakistani, British third culture guy. Mohsin was born and raised in Dhahran Aramco, Saudi Arabia and schooled in the United Kingdom. Graduated in BSc Computing from Leeds and reside in the beautiful town of Harrogate in Englandâ€™s North Yorkshire.

Interested in technology and enthusiastically watched the industry change from a young age, from all aspects of web and gaming technologies. He was a research and developer for a consultancy firm for three years in the Greater London area. Enjoys tinkering and experimenting with social softwares, networks, servers and open source technology.

He’s an amateur designer, artist and photographer, an avid gamer and graphic novel fanatic. He reads, writes, blogs, twitters and enjoys the web industry to itâ€™s fullest and ever changing capacity.
